text: Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the HP OMEN 15 15.6'' UHD 4K Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel i7 Quad Core, 2TB HDD + 128GB SSD, 15.6 inch UHD 3840 x 2160, 32GB RAM, GeForce GTX 1050 Ti , Win 10) is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HP OMEN 15 15.6'' UHD 4K Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel i7 Quad Core, 2TB HDD + 128GB SSD, 15.6 inch UHD 3840 x 2160, 32GB RAM, GeForce GTX 1050 Ti , Win 10)!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the HP OMEN 15 15.6'' UHD 4K Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel i7 Quad Core, 2TB HDD + 128GB SSD, 15.6 inch UHD 3840 x 2160, 32GB RAM, GeForce GTX 1050 Ti , Win 10) is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Apex Legends and Elden Ring. The build quality of the HP OMEN 15 15.6'' UHD 4K Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel i7 Quad Core, 2TB HDD + 128GB SSD, 15.6 inch UHD 3840 x 2160, 32GB RAM, GeForce GTX 1050 Ti , Win 10) is solid, and the keyboard is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HP OMEN 15 15.6'' UHD 4K Gaming and Business Laptop (Intel i7 Quad Core, 2TB HDD + 128GB SSD, 15.6 inch UHD 3840 x 2160, 32GB RAM, GeForce GTX 1050 Ti , Win 10)!
